system.unidentifiedDesc: The flask or vial holds a swirling and mysterious concoction inside.
system.description:
If the user speaks to one sleeping or paralyzed creature within 30 feet, the creature hears and silently answers as if awake. The user receives the responses telepathically and understands the language used. The creature is not compelled to be truthful. Dead and undead creatures cannot be affected, but cursed sleeping victims can be.

The effect lasts for 1 round and applies to only one sleeping or paralyzed creature.
